members.joinCircumstances: Sai is the current leader of the Happo Navy, having inherited the position.
Boo serves as the vice leader under Sai's command.
Don Chinjao is the retired 12th leader of the Happo Navy and grandfather of Sai.

keyMoments.title: Happo Navy Members Compete in Corrida Colosseum
keyMoments.description: Sai, Boo, and Don Chinjao are introduced as members of the Happo Navy from the Flower Country, showcasing their mastery of the Hasshoken fighting style.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the Happo Navy as a powerful organization from the Flower Country with a unique martial art tradition.

keyMoments.title: Don Chinjao Uses Conqueror's Haki
keyMoments.description: Don Chinjao demonstrates the legendary power of the former 12th leader by using Conqueror's Haki.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Happo Navy's connection to legendary pirates and great power.
